short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates temporary email addresses that forward to your primary address.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jumbles is a Google Chrome plugin that lets you generate disposable, temporary email addresses that forward email to your actual address.

Once you have what you need from a website, you can just delete the disposable address, and youâ€™ll never hear from them again.

No spam, no ads, just peace and quiet and a clean inbox.

You can have up to 10 different temporary email addresses at once, with 20 free email forwards per month from your temporary addresses to your actual email address. If you need additional email forwards, they can be purchased easily from the jumbles store, which is accessible through the app in the Profile tab.
